question: import from the string module provides a convenient and efficient way to access all lowercase letters of the English alphabet for string manipulation or processing tasks
Write a function get_frequencies() that takes a single parameter called filename
Initialize a dictionary to store frequencies of each lowercase letters with all frequencies starting at zero using dictionary comprehension in Python
Open a file and read its contents and Convert its content to lowercase to count all instances
answer:
with open(filename, 'r') as file:
 text = file.read().lower()
